column4: To verify if the dashboard page loads successfully upon login.
column6: The dashboard page should load successfully, displaying all widgets and data.
column7:
1. Open the "https://app.nostro.co/sign-in" URL.
2. Observe the Homepage loads successfully.

column6: Window should show an "Webpage error" message to user when the link is invali or incorrect.
column7:
1. Open the "https://app.nostro.co/sign-in" URL.
2. Enter the invalid link or extra characters in th valid link.

column4: To verify error message page "Go back" button.
column6: Clicking on the ""Go back" button it should go to the sign in, which is previous page.
column7:
1. Open the "https://app.nostro.co/sign-in " URL.
2. Enter the invalid link or extra characters in th valid link.
3. Click on the "Go back" button.

column6: When the server connection is failed to connect/offline, it should display the "Server is Offline" page with kind message for user.
column7:
1. Open the "https://app.nostro.co/sign-in " URL.
2. Verify the server is offline page is displayed.
